duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the planning, implementation, and maintenance of IT infrastructure solutions and platforms.
Deliver high-quality IT architectural systems and infrastructure designs, accounting for existing technical debt and development bottlenecks.
Establish and maintain technical security architecture, availability, performance, and maintenance activities.
Communicate and accurately document all architectural decisions, plans, goals, and functional requirements.
Serve as the IT architect and technical lead for service delivery by designing and overseeing the implementation of end-to-end integrated systems.
Contribute to the definition of the product strategy and BI Target Enterprise Architecture.
Identify and propose new BI ETA standards and facilitate quality improvement efforts.
Stay up to date on future innovations, technical trends, and apply this knowledge to direct future changes.
Run complex projects ensuring they are completed on time and within budget.
Develop project plans, administer the release management process, and ensure that tasks are completed on time and within budget.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT or related field (Master's preferred)
